profile.name: Profile
profile.description: Displays information about a summoner: best champions, recent game, master points, etc

mastery.name: Mastery
mastery.description: Get a best champions for a summoner

live.name: Live
live.description: Obtaining live game information from a summoner

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Get the icon for a champion

server.name: Server
server.description: Get the status of a LoL server (example: LAN, LAS, KR)

matches.name: Matches
matches.description: Get the matches of a LoL summoner

account.name: Account
account.description: Add or remove a summoner to your discord account
